title: Gemini with Deep Think officially achieves gold-medal standard at the IMO
summary:
In a significant breakthrough, Google DeepMind's advanced version of Gemini Deep Think achieved gold-medal standard at the International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO) 2025, solving five out of six problems perfectly and earning 35 total points. This surpasses their previous silver-medal achievement in 2024 with AlphaProof and AlphaGeometry 2.

Unlike the previous year's model, which required translation between natural language and formal languages and several days of computation, Gemini Deep Think operated end-to-end in natural language within the 4.5-hour competition time limit, producing rigorous mathematical proofs directly from problem descriptions.

The success is attributed to "Deep Think" mode, an enhanced reasoning mode employing parallel thinking, combined with reinforcement learning techniques and training on high-quality mathematics solutions and IMO tips.  IMO President Prof. Dr. Gregor Dolinar confirmed the gold-medal score, praising the clarity and precision of the solutions.

Google DeepMind plans to make a version of this Deep Think model available to trusted testers before rolling it out to Google AI Ultra subscribers.  They also continue to develop their formal systems, AlphaGeometry and AlphaProof, with the aim of creating AI agents that combine natural language fluency with rigorous reasoning. Google DeepMind anticipates that these AI systems will become invaluable tools for advancing human knowledge across various fields. The company thanked the IMO, the large team of engineers, researchers, and mathematicians who contributed to this achievement.
chinese_title: Gemini with Deep Think 在IMO大赛中正式达到金牌标准
chinese_summary:
在重大突破中，谷歌DeepMind的升级版Gemini Deep Think在2025年国际数学奥林匹克竞赛(IMO)中达到金牌标准，完美解决了六道题中的五道，总分35分。这超越了其此前于2024年凭借AlphaProof和AlphaGeometry 2获得的银牌成绩。

与去年需要在自然语言和形式语言之间进行转换并需要数天计算的模型不同，Gemini Deep Think在4.5小时的比赛时限内，以自然语言端到端运行，直接从问题描述中生成严谨的数学证明。

这一成功归功于“Deep Think”模式，这是一种增强的推理模式，采用并行思考，结合强化学习技术，并接受高质量的数学解题方案和IMO技巧的训练。IMO主席Gregor Dolinar教授博士确认了金牌成绩，并赞扬了解题方案的清晰性和精确性。

谷歌DeepMind计划在向Google AI Ultra订阅者推出之前，向可信的测试人员提供该Deep Think模型的某个版本。他们还将继续开发其形式系统AlphaGeometry和AlphaProof，旨在创建能够将自然语言的流畅性与严谨的推理相结合的AI代理。谷歌DeepMind预计，这些AI系统将成为推进人类在各个领域知识进步的宝贵工具。该公司感谢IMO，以及为此成就做出贡献的大量工程师、研究人员和数学家团队。

title: Solar+storage is so much farther along than you think
summary:
This Volts podcast episode features a conversation with Kostantsa Rangelova and Dave Jones of Ember about their new report on the declining costs of solar+storage. The report finds that in sunny cities, solar+storage can now provide baseload power for less than the cost of new nuclear or even new gas.

The discussion highlights the rapid advancements and cost reductions in battery technology, particularly a 40% price drop in the last year alone. They explain how combining solar and storage allows for maximizing grid connection utilization by flattening the electricity generation curve, enabling 24/7 power output and displacing fossil fuel generation at all hours.

The podcast also explores real-world examples, such as a 1 GW 24/7 solar+storage project in the UAE and a solar+battery-powered tourist village in Saudi Arabia. The speakers discuss the shift towards LFP batteries, which are cheaper, cobalt-free, and have longer lifecycles, as well as the potential of sodium-ion batteries. Despite the land footprint concerns, the falling prices of both solar and storage are making this combination increasingly competitive. The main takeaway is that the economics of solar+storage have drastically improved, and even energy professionals need to catch up with the current reality.
chinese_title: 太阳能+储能的进展远超你的想象
chinese_summary:
本期Volts播客节目采访了Ember的Kostantsa Rangelova和Dave Jones，讨论了他们关于太阳能+储能成本下降的新报告。该报告发现，在阳光充足的城市，太阳能+储能现在可以以低于新建核电甚至新建天然气发电的成本提供基本负荷电力。

讨论重点强调了电池技术的快速发展和成本降低，特别是仅去年一年就下降了40%。他们解释了如何通过平滑发电曲线，实现24/7全天候电力输出，以及在所有时段取代化石燃料发电，从而最大限度地利用电网连接，实现太阳能和储能的结合。

该播客还探讨了实际案例，例如阿联酋的一个1吉瓦24/7太阳能+储能项目，以及沙特阿拉伯的一个太阳能+电池供电的旅游村。演讲者讨论了转向更便宜、不含钴且寿命更长的磷酸铁锂电池，以及钠离子电池的潜力。尽管存在土地占用问题，但太阳能和储能价格的下降使得这种组合越来越有竞争力。 主要结论是，太阳能+储能的经济性已大大提高，甚至能源专业人士也需要赶上当前的现实。

title: New records on Wendelstein 7-X
summary:
Wendelstein 7-X, the world's largest stellarator fusion device, has achieved new performance milestones, including a world record for triple product during long plasma discharges. The triple product, a key metric for fusion energy generation, measures how close a device is to achieving net energy production. Wendelstein 7-X sustained a peak value of this parameter for 43 seconds during its recent OP 2.3 campaign, surpassing previous records held by tokamak devices like JT-60U and JET for long pulse durations.

This achievement signifies a crucial step towards developing a power-plant-capable stellarator, bringing the triple product to tokamak levels during sustained plasma pulses. The success was attributed to international collaboration between the Wendelstein 7-X team, EUROfusion, and partners from the United States. Notably, a pellet injector from Oak Ridge National Laboratory enabled the long plasma durations by supplying a steady stream of hydrogen particles. Contributions from other European and American labs provided essential diagnostics for measuring the triple product's contributing factors.

In addition to the triple product record, the campaign also achieved milestones in energy turnover and plasma pressure relative to magnetic pressure. These accomplishments validate the stellarator concept and showcase the significance of international collaboration in advancing fusion energy research.
chinese_title: Wendelstein 7-X 新纪录
chinese_summary:
世界最大仿星器核聚变装置 Wendelstein 7-X 取得新进展，包括长等离子体放电期间三重乘积的世界纪录。三重乘积是衡量核聚变能量产生的关键指标，用于衡量装置与实现净能量产生的接近程度。Wendelstein 7-X 在最近的 OP 2.3 实验中，将该参数的峰值维持了 43 秒，超过了 JT-60U 和 JET 等托卡马克装置在长脉冲持续时间方面的先前记录。

这一成就标志着在开发具有发电厂能力的仿星器方面迈出了关键一步，将持续等离子体脉冲期间的三重乘积提高到托卡马克水平。该成功归功于 Wendelstein 7-X 团队、EUROfusion 以及美国合作伙伴之间的国际合作。值得注意的是，来自橡树岭国家实验室的颗粒注入器通过提供稳定的氢粒子流实现了长时间的等离子体放电。其他欧洲和美国实验室的贡献为测量三重乘积的影响因素提供了必要的诊断。

除了三重乘积记录外，该实验还在能量转换和相对于磁压的等离子体压力方面取得了里程碑式的成就。这些成就验证了仿星器的概念，并展示了国际合作在推进核聚变能源研究中的重要性。

title: Using MacBook's trackpad as digital weighing scale
summary:
TrackWeight is a macOS application that transforms a MacBook's Force Touch trackpad into a digital weighing scale. It leverages the Open Multi-Touch Support library to access raw pressure data from the trackpad, which is normally inaccessible. The application calibrates the pressure readings against a traditional scale, converting them into weight measurements, and surprisingly, the raw data is already in grams.

To use TrackWeight, the user opens the application, places a finger on the trackpad, and then rests the object to be weighed on the trackpad while maintaining finger contact. This contact is crucial because the trackpad only registers pressure when a conductive object (like a finger) is detected.

Requirements for running TrackWeight include macOS 13.0+, a MacBook with a Force Touch trackpad (2015+ MacBook Pro, 2016+ MacBook), a disabled App Sandbox, and Xcode 16.0+ with Swift 6.0+. The installation process involves cloning the repository, opening the project in Xcode, disabling the App Sandbox, and building the application.

The application has limitations: it requires finger contact during weighing, objects must not interfere with finger contact, and metal objects may need insulation to avoid misidentification as finger touch. TrackWeight utilizes SwiftUI for the interface, Combine for data flow, and the Open Multi-Touch Support library for trackpad access.

The author emphasizes that TrackWeight is for experimental and educational purposes only and should not be used for critical measurements. Accuracy should always be verified with a calibrated scale for important applications.
chinese_title: 将MacBook触控板用作数字秤
chinese_summary:
TrackWeight：将MacBook触控板变为数字秤

TrackWeight是一款macOS应用程序，可将MacBook的Force Touch触控板转化为数字秤。它利用Open Multi-Touch Support库访问通常无法访问的触控板原始压力数据。该应用程序将压力读数与传统秤进行校准，将其转换为重量测量值，令人惊讶的是，原始数据已经是克。

要使用TrackWeight，用户需要打开应用程序，将手指放在触控板上，然后在保持手指接触的同时，将要称重的物体放在触控板上。这种接触至关重要，因为触控板只有在检测到导电物体（如手指）时才会记录压力。

运行TrackWeight的要求包括macOS 13.0+，配备Force Touch触控板的MacBook（2015+ MacBook Pro，2016+ MacBook），禁用App Sandbox，以及带有Swift 6.0+的Xcode 16.0+。安装过程包括克隆存储库，在Xcode中打开项目，禁用App Sandbox，然后构建应用程序。

该应用程序存在一些限制：称重过程中需要手指接触，物体不得干扰手指接触，金属物体可能需要绝缘以避免被误识别为手指触摸。TrackWeight使用SwiftUI构建界面，Combine处理数据流，并使用Open Multi-Touch Support库访问触控板。

作者强调TrackWeight仅用于实验和教育目的，不应用于关键测量。对于重要的应用，应始终使用校准过的秤来验证准确性。

title: Accountant Simulator 2025
summary:
The Penrose article, "Can LLMs Do Accounting?" explores the potential for Large Language Models (LLMs) to automate and improve accounting tasks. While LLMs are showing promise in understanding and generating human-like text, their application to accounting faces significant challenges due to the inherent requirements of accuracy, reliability, and explainability.

The article highlights LLMs' strengths in processing unstructured data (e.g., invoices, receipts), potentially automating data extraction and categorization. They could also assist with tasks like drafting financial reports or summarizing complex accounting regulations.

However, the article emphasizes crucial limitations. Accounting relies on precise calculations and logical reasoning, areas where LLMs can struggle. LLMs are prone to "hallucinations," generating incorrect or fabricated information, which is unacceptable in a field demanding meticulous accuracy. Furthermore, accounting requires adherence to strict rules and regulations, and LLMs' inability to consistently apply these rules poses a major hurdle.

The article suggests that while LLMs can augment certain accounting workflows, they are unlikely to fully replace human accountants in the near future. The need for explainability and auditability in accounting necessitates a deep understanding of the underlying logic, something LLMs currently lack. The most promising applications involve using LLMs to automate repetitive tasks, freeing up accountants to focus on more complex analytical and strategic work. The author concludes that a hybrid approach, combining human expertise with LLM capabilities, is the most likely path forward.
chinese_title: 会计模拟2025
chinese_summary:
Penrose文章《LLM能否胜任会计工作？》探讨了大型语言模型（LLM）自动化和改进会计任务的潜力。虽然LLM在理解和生成类人文本方面展现出前景，但由于会计固有的准确性、可靠性和可解释性要求，它们的应用面临着重大挑战。

文章强调了LLM在处理非结构化数据（例如，发票、收据）方面的优势，有可能实现数据提取和分类的自动化。它们还可以协助起草财务报告或总结复杂的会计法规等任务。

然而，文章强调了关键的局限性。会计依赖于精确的计算和逻辑推理，而这正是LLM的弱点。LLM容易产生“幻觉”，生成不正确或捏造的信息，这在需要一丝不苟的准确性的领域是不可接受的。此外，会计要求遵守严格的规则和法规，而LLM无法始终如一地应用这些规则构成了一个主要障碍。

文章认为，虽然LLM可以增强某些会计工作流程，但在不久的将来，它们不太可能完全取代人类会计师。会计中对可解释性和可审计性的需求，要求对底层逻辑有深刻的理解，这是LLM目前所缺乏的。最有前景的应用是使用LLM自动化重复性任务，从而解放会计师，让他们专注于更复杂的分析和战略工作。作者的结论是，结合人类专业知识和LLM能力的混合方法是最有可能的发展方向。

title: SecretSpec: Declarative Secrets Management
summary:
SecretSpec is introduced as a declarative secrets management tool designed to address the shortcomings of traditional `.env` file-based approaches. The problems with `.env` include lack of clear application-secret contracts, parsing ambiguity, difficult password manager integration, vendor lock-in, and lack of encryption. Existing alternatives like encrypted `.env` files or Vault introduce complexity regarding key management, trust requirements, and operational overhead.

SecretSpec tackles this by separating secret management into three key concerns: **WHAT** secrets are needed, **HOW** they are required (e.g., required, optional, defaults, validation), and **WHERE** they are stored. This allows applications to declare their secret needs in a `secretspec.toml` file, while different environments (development, CI/CD, production) can use their preferred secret storage providers (keychain, environment variables, AWS Secrets Manager) without modifying application code.

The article demonstrates the usage of SecretSpec in different environments using a shared `secretspec.toml` file and various secret providers. Furthermore, it presents a Rust SDK that offers type-safe access to secrets and compile-time guarantees, ensuring that the application only knows *what* secrets it needs, not *where* they come from. SecretSpec promotes clean, portable application logic. The authors encourage the development of similar SDKs for other languages and hint at future features like secret rotation and generation.
chinese_title: SecretSpec: 声明式密钥管理
chinese_summary:
SecretSpec：一种声明式密钥管理工具，旨在解决传统基于`.env`文件方法的不足。`.env`的问题包括缺乏清晰的应用密钥契约、解析歧义、密码管理器集成困难、厂商锁定以及缺乏加密。现有的替代方案，如加密的`.env`文件或Vault，引入了密钥管理、信任需求和运维开销方面的复杂性。

SecretSpec通过将密钥管理分离为三个关键方面来解决这个问题：**需要什么**密钥，**如何**需要它们（例如，必需、可选、默认值、验证）以及**存储在哪里**。这使得应用程序可以在`secretspec.toml`文件中声明其密钥需求，而不同的环境（开发、CI/CD、生产）可以使用其首选的密钥存储提供商（密钥链、环境变量、AWS Secrets Manager），而无需修改应用程序代码。

本文演示了在不同环境中使用共享`secretspec.toml`文件和各种密钥提供商来使用SecretSpec。此外，它还介绍了一个Rust SDK，该SDK提供类型安全的密钥访问和编译时保证，确保应用程序只知道它需要*什么*密钥，而不知道它们来自*哪里*。SecretSpec促进了干净、可移植的应用程序逻辑。作者鼓励开发其他语言的类似SDK，并暗示了未来的功能，如密钥轮换和生成。

title: Modern Debian-based Window Maker distribution
summary:
Window Maker Live is a Debian/Bookworm-based Linux distribution using the Window Maker window manager as its default graphical user interface. The current version, 12.8, emphasizes its reliance on Debian Bookworm rather than Window Maker's version. It's distributed as a live, installable ISO image, available for download at sourceforge.net/projects/wmlive/files/wmlive-bookworm-12.8/.

Window Maker Live offers a preconfigured and visually consistent desktop environment, integrating components from other desktop environments like XFCE4, MATE, and LXQT, with a focus on GNUstep. It serves as an alternative installation medium for Debian, offering full compatibility with Debian/Bookworm repositories for updates and bug fixes.

The ISO images support 17 widely used European languages and can be used to install Debian/Window Maker to a hard drive. Users can also build their own ISO images using the wmlive-bookworm-12.8.tar.xz archive and the Debian Live Build system. The package selection is primarily based on Debian's stable "bookworm" branch. The project encourages donations to support its continued development at www.paypal.me/wmlive.

title: UK backing down on Apple encryption backdoor after pressure from US
summary:
The UK government, under Sir Keir Starmer, is reportedly considering backing down from its demand that Apple provide a "back door" into its secure cloud storage system, following pressure from the US, particularly from Vice President JD Vance and former President Donald Trump. The UK Home Office had issued a "technical capability notice" under the Investigatory Powers Act, compelling Apple to provide access, which Apple has resisted, even withdrawing its secure cloud service from the UK.

The US government views the UK's stance as a threat to technology partnerships and a potential violation of user privacy. US officials have warned that forcing Apple to break its end-to-end encryption is a "red line." Apple has challenged the order at the Investigatory Powers Tribunal, and Meta-owned WhatsApp has joined the legal challenge.

The UK government's pursuit of the encryption issue has created divisions within the government, with some officials viewing it as poorly handled by the Home Office. There is concern that the issue could impede technology agreements with the US, particularly in areas like AI regulation. The UK government remains reluctant to take actions that could be perceived by US officials as a threat to free speech.

title: We made Postgres writes faster, but it broke replication
summary:
This article details how the authors made Postgres writes faster using a Log-Structured Merge (LSM) tree in their `pg_search` extension, but encountered replication issues, specifically with physical replication.

Standard Postgres uses B-tree or GIN indexes, which are not optimized for high-volume writes. LSM trees, designed for faster writes, store incoming data in memory and then flush it to disk in sorted segments. However, this approach revealed limitations with Postgres' Write-Ahead Log (WAL) based physical replication.

The authors explain that replication safety requires both physical (structurally valid data) and logical consistency (data reflects a coherent view). Atomicity is crucial for physical consistency because locks aren't replayed on replicas. Multi-node operations require techniques like Copy-on-Write to avoid data corruption without global locks on replicas.

A major challenge arose with VACUUM operations, which remove "dead" tuples flagged by Multi-Version Concurrency Control (MVCC). Compactions in LSM trees, similar to VACUUMs, increased the frequency of conflicts where replicas could access data being cleaned up on the primary.

The solution was leveraging the `hot_standby_feedback` Postgres setting. This allows the replica to inform the primary of the oldest transaction ID (xmin) still in use, enabling the primary to defer cleanup operations and avoid premature VACUUMs. While `hot_standby_feedback` is helpful, the authors highlight the challenges of guaranteeing replication safety in a distributed Postgres system. They conclude that their approach of an atomically logged LSM tree with `hot_standby_feedback` provides the fastest search performance without sacrificing consistency.
chinese_title: 我们提高了Postgres写入速度，但破坏了复制。
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者如何在他们的`pg_search`扩展中使用日志结构合并树（LSM树）来加速Postgres写入，但遇到了复制问题，特别是物理复制方面的问题。

标准的Postgres使用B树或GIN索引，它们并未针对高容量写入进行优化。专为更快写入设计的LSM树将传入的数据存储在内存中，然后将其以排序的段刷新到磁盘。然而，这种方法揭示了Postgres基于预写日志（WAL）的物理复制的局限性。

作者解释说，复制安全性需要物理一致性（结构上有效的数据）和逻辑一致性（数据反映了一个连贯的视图）。原子性对于物理一致性至关重要，因为锁不会在副本上重放。多节点操作需要像写时复制这样的技术，以避免在没有副本全局锁的情况下发生数据损坏。

一个主要的挑战出现在VACUUM操作中，该操作会删除多版本并发控制（MVCC）标记为“死亡”的元组。LSM树中的压缩与VACUUM类似，增加了冲突的频率，副本可能访问主数据库上正在清理的数据。

解决方案是利用`hot_standby_feedback`这个Postgres设置。 这允许副本通知主数据库仍在使用的最旧的事务ID（xmin），从而使主数据库能够推迟清理操作并避免过早的VACUUM。 虽然`hot_standby_feedback`很有帮助，但作者强调了在分布式Postgres系统中保证复制安全性的挑战。 他们得出结论，他们使用原子记录的LSM树和`hot_standby_feedback`的方法提供了最快的搜索性能，而不会牺牲一致性。

title: Hiding messages in a deck playing cards
summary:
Asher Falcon's blog post details a method for encoding text within the seemingly random order of a standard 52-card deck. The core idea leverages the immense number of possible card arrangements (52!), which translates to roughly 225 bits of potential data storage.

The article explains how to achieve this by using Lehmer codes to represent each unique card permutation numerically. The Lehmer code is then converted into a factorial number, which can be easily transformed into a single, large decimal number representing the encoded message. This process maps the card order to a specific numerical value within the 225-bit range.

To make this usable, the author proposes a 5-bit character set including letters, space, and a few punctuation marks, allowing for encoding up to 45 characters. The blog provides Python code snippets for converting between decimal numbers, factoradic representations, permutations, and the chosen character set. This code facilitates both encoding text into a card arrangement and decoding it back.

The post emphasizes that the encoding/decoding works due to the reversibility of each step in the process. The author also notes an interesting characteristic of the Lehmer code: changing a card affects subsequent characters in the decoded message but leaves previous ones untouched. A web application, implemented in C++ and compiled to WebAssembly for browser-based performance, is provided, allowing users to try the technique themselves, including an optional XOR cipher for added "encryption".
chinese_title: 将信息藏在扑克牌中

该文章解释了如何通过使用Lehmer码来数字表示每个独特的纸牌排列来实现这一点。然后，Lehmer码被转换为阶乘数，阶乘数可以很容易地转换为表示编码消息的单个大型十进制数。此过程将纸牌顺序映射到225位范围内的特定数值。

为了使之可用，作者提出了一个5位字符集，包括字母、空格和一些标点符号，允许编码多达45个字符。该博客提供了Python代码片段，用于在十进制数、阶乘进制表示、排列和所选字符集之间进行转换。此代码有助于将文本编码为纸牌排列并将其解码回来。

该文章强调，编码/解码之所以有效，是因为该过程中每个步骤的可逆性。作者还指出了Lehmer码的一个有趣的特性：更改一张牌会影响解码消息中的后续字符，但不会影响之前的字符。提供了一个用C++实现并编译为WebAssembly的Web应用程序，以提高基于浏览器的性能，允许用户亲自尝试该技术，包括一个可选的XOR密码，以增加“加密”性。

title: “Dynamic programming” is not referring to “computer programming”
summary:
This article clarifies the meaning of "dynamic programming" in computer science, arguing that the confusion stems from misunderstanding the word "programming" in this context. It's not about computer programming (writing code) but rather about "planning" or "scheduling," similar to "TV programming" or the planning stages of civil engineering projects.

The article illustrates this with an example of building construction, where steps must be ordered and dependencies respected (e.g., the foundation must be laid before the structure). Similarly, dynamic programming involves planning the order of sub-problems to solve a larger problem, ensuring dependencies are met and redundant computations are avoided (as demonstrated with the Fibonacci sequence example). This "program" can be built top-down or bottom-up.

The article concludes by explaining the historical origin of the term, coined by Richard Bellman. He chose "dynamic programming" partly to avoid scrutiny from a Secretary of Defense who disliked the word "research," selecting a term that sounded less threatening and scientific while also accurately describing the multi-stage, time-varying nature of the problem-solving approach. The term "dynamic" was chosen because it was difficult to use in a pejorative way, making it politically safe.
chinese_title: “动态规划”并非指“计算机编程”。

本文阐明了计算机科学中“动态规划”的含义，认为困惑源于对该术语中“规划”一词的误解。它并非指计算机编程（编写代码），而是类似于“电视节目编排”或土木工程项目的规划阶段的“计划”或“调度”。

文章以建筑施工为例进行说明，其中步骤必须按顺序执行并尊重依赖关系（例如，必须先打地基才能建造结构）。 类似地，动态规划涉及规划子问题的解决顺序以解决更大的问题，确保满足依赖关系并避免冗余计算（如斐波那契数列示例所示）。 这个“规划”可以自顶向下或自底向上地构建。

文章最后解释了该术语的历史渊源，由理查德·贝尔曼创造。 他选择“动态规划”的部分原因是避免国防部长对“研究”一词的反感，选择了一个听起来不那么具有威胁性和科学性的术语，同时也准确地描述了解决问题方法的多阶段、时变性质。“动态”一词的选择是因为很难以贬义的方式使用它，使其在政治上是安全的。

title: India: Income Tax Bill allows officials to forcibly access social media, email
summary:
In July 2025, the Indian Parliament's Select Committee tabled a report on the new Income Tax Bill 2025, retaining controversial provisions that grant tax officials broad powers to access citizens' social media and private emails during search and seizure operations. The bill aims to simplify and rationalize the existing Income Tax Act of 1961.

The new bill mandates individuals to provide tax officers with technical assistance, including access codes, to inspect electronically stored information on computer systems, social media accounts, online investment platforms, and other digital spaces. It even allows officials to bypass access codes if necessary.

While stakeholders consulted by the Select Committee expressed concerns about these provisions, suggesting limitations on accessing social media and a focus on tax-related information only, the committee defended the measures. They argued that these powers are essential to uncover encrypted communications and unaccounted transactions often hidden within electronic records. The committee rejected suggestions to require tangible reasons for seeking access, deeming it unfeasible and potentially hindering the ability to prevent abuse of power and protect taxpayer privacy.

Despite the controversy surrounding these expanded search and seizure powers, the committee highlighted the bill's significant simplification of India's income tax legislation. The bill reduces the number of words, chapters, and sections while increasing the number of tables and formulae, aiming for greater clarity and ease of understanding.

新法案强制要求个人向税务官员提供技术协助，包括访问代码，以检查计算机系统、社交媒体账户、在线投资平台和其他数字空间中存储的电子信息。它甚至允许官员在必要时绕过访问代码。

尽管特别委员会咨询的利益相关者对这些条款表示担忧，建议限制访问社交媒体，并仅关注与税收相关的信息，但委员会为这些措施辩护。他们认为，这些权力对于发现加密通信和通常隐藏在电子记录中的未申报交易至关重要。委员会拒绝了要求提供寻求访问的实际理由的建议，认为这不可行，并可能阻碍防止滥用权力和保护纳税人隐私的能力。

尽管这些扩大搜查和扣押权力的规定存在争议，但委员会强调了该法案对印度所得税立法的重大简化。该法案减少了字数、章节和条款数量，同时增加了表格和公式的数量，旨在提高清晰度和易于理解性。

title: Quadratic forms beyond arithmetic
summary:
This article provides an overview of the algebraic theory of quadratic forms, focusing on developments over the last four decades. It begins by tracing the historical roots of quadratic forms, from ancient civilizations to Gauss's work and the algebraic theory established by Witt and Pfister. The article then delves into modern approaches, emphasizing the interplay between algebraic geometry and quadratic form theory. A key technique involves associating a quadric hypersurface $X_q$ to a quadratic form $q$ and studying algebraic cycles on products of quadrics.

The article highlights the solution of the Milnor conjectures as a major achievement, linking the graded Witt ring to Galois cohomology via Milnor's K-theory.  It also discusses discrete invariants of fields defined by quadratic forms, such as the u-invariant and the Pythagoras number, outlining recent results and open questions. Furthermore, it touches upon the determination of splitting patterns for quadratic forms and introduces Chow motives as a visualization tool for indecomposable direct summands of quadrics. The article focuses on fields of characteristic different from 2.

chinese_summary:

文章强调了Milnor猜想的解决，通过Milnor的K-理论将分次Witt环与Galois上同调联系起来，这是一项重大成就。文章还讨论了由二次型定义的域的离散不变量，例如u-不变量和毕达哥拉斯数，概述了最新的结果和未决的问题。此外，文章还涉及二次型的分裂模式的确定，并介绍了Chow动机作为二次曲面不可分解的直和项的可视化工具。本文侧重于特征不等于2的域。

title: The daily life of a medieval king
summary:
This article explores the daily life of King Charles V of France (reigned 1364-1380) based on Christine de Pizan's biography, *Livre des faits et bonnes mœurs du sage roy Charles V*. Pizan's account, informed by her father's role at court and consultation with royal staff, details the King's routine.

The day began early with prayer and lighthearted interaction with servants. Following mass, Charles addressed petitions from his subjects, demonstrating his accessibility and commitment to justice. He then attended short Royal Council meetings, possibly limited due to his health. His meals were simple, followed by music.

Afternoons were spent receiving visitors, ambassadors, and officials, handling governance matters like signing letters and dispensing rewards. A short rest was followed by leisure activities such as viewing jewels and enjoying his gardens, where he interacted with family and courtiers.

Michael Brauer's analysis emphasizes the significance of Charles's public appearances, reinforcing the image of a wise and just ruler. He highlights the three main social settings: public appearances, interactions with family/courtiers, and private time. Pizan's account portrays a balanced life, blending prayer, governance, and leisure. This structured routine was presented as a model for political life, reflecting the medieval emphasis on order and self-governance as essential for effective rule.

一天从早晨的祈祷和与仆人的轻松互动开始。弥撒之后，查理处理臣民的请愿，展现了他的平易近人和对正义的承诺。然后他会参加简短的御前会议，这可能因他的健康状况而受到限制。他的膳食很简单，之后是音乐。

下午用来接待来访者、大使和官员，处理治理事务，如签署信件和发放奖励。短暂的休息之后，他会进行休闲活动，例如观赏珠宝和欣赏他的花园，在那里他与家人和朝臣互动。

迈克尔·布劳尔的分析强调了查理公开露面的重要性，强化了一位明智而公正的统治者的形象。他突出了三个主要的社交场合：公开露面、与家人/朝臣的互动以及私人时间。皮桑的叙述描绘了一种平衡的生活，融合了祈祷、治理和休闲。这种有条不紊的日常活动被呈现为政治生活的典范，反映了中世纪对秩序和自治的强调，认为它们是有效统治的关键。

title: Writing your Clojure tests in EDN files
summary:
This article describes a simplified approach to Clojure unit testing using EDN files. Instead of complex test runners, tests are defined as data in `.edn` files, resembling REPL interactions. Each test case contains an `:eval` key holding Clojure code to be executed.

The test runner executes the code in `:eval` and automatically adds a `:result` key with the evaluated output, then pretty-prints the entire test case back to the EDN file. There is no explicit "passing" or "failing" state. Changes in test results are detected via `git diff`, requiring developers to review and either commit expected changes or fix underlying bugs.

The author uses helper functions like `t/with-db` for common tasks like populating in-memory databases for tests. If the code in `:eval` throws an exception, the exception data (including a truncated stack trace) is recorded under the `:ex` key.  Furthermore, any values "tapped" (using Clojure's `tap>`) during execution are captured under the `:tapped` key, allowing for inspecting intermediate values.

The author provides a `run-examples!` function (available for copying) that locates and runs these tests. This function is integrated into a file watcher to automatically update test results on file saves, enabling a rapid feedback loop during development. The author prefers this approach for its simplicity and direct mapping to REPL-driven development.
chinese_title: 使用 EDN 文件编写 Clojure 测试
chinese_summary:
本文介绍了一种使用 EDN 文件简化 Clojure 单元测试的方法。测试不是通过复杂的测试运行器，而是定义为 `.edn` 文件中的数据，类似于 REPL 交互。每个测试用例都包含一个 `:eval` 键，其中包含要执行的 Clojure 代码。

测试运行器执行 `:eval` 中的代码，并自动添加一个 `:result` 键，其中包含评估后的输出，然后将整个测试用例美化打印回 EDN 文件。没有明确的“通过”或“失败”状态。测试结果的更改通过 `git diff` 检测，要求开发人员审查并提交预期更改或修复底层错误。

作者使用 `t/with-db` 等辅助函数来执行常见任务，例如为测试填充内存数据库。如果 `:eval` 中的代码抛出异常，异常数据（包括截断的堆栈跟踪）将记录在 `:ex` 键下。此外，执行期间“tap”（使用 Clojure 的 `tap>`）的任何值都会被捕获在 `:tapped` 键下，从而可以检查中间值。

作者提供了一个 `run-examples!` 函数（可供复制），用于查找和运行这些测试。此函数集成到一个文件监视器中，以便在文件保存时自动更新测试结果，从而在开发过程中实现快速反馈循环。作者更喜欢这种方法，因为它简单且直接映射到 REPL 驱动的开发。

title: Australian anti-porn group claims responsibility for Steams new censorship rules
summary:
This article details how the Australian anti-pornography group, Collective Shout, claims responsibility for Steam's recent crackdown on sexually explicit games and stricter moderation guidelines. Valve cited pressure from payment processors as the reason for the changes, and Collective Shout says their campaign targeting these processors incited that pressure.

The group, known for its campaigns against content it deems objectifying or sexualizing, previously pressured retailers to stop selling Grand Theft Auto 5 and successfully prevented Tyler the Creator from touring Australia. They launched a campaign urging payment processors to cease working with Steam and itch.io due to the presence of games featuring "rape, incest, and child-abuse."

After what they reported as a letter writing campaign involving over 1,000 contacts to the payment processors Collective Shout claimed victory when Steam removed numerous games on July 15th. The article notes discrepancies in the numbers of removed games claimed by Collective Shout versus those identified on SteamDB.

The article also highlights the retraction of two related articles from Waypoint, allegedly due to concerns about their controversial content, and the subsequent resignation of the articles' author, Ana Valens, who stands by her reporting and urges further investigation into payment processor-based censorship. Valens claimed there was an obvious payment processor censorship being implemented on Steam, Itch.io and Patreon. The article suggests that Collective Shout's success could embolden them to pursue further restrictions on Steam's content, despite concerns about overreach.

title: Comparison of MGR, SunView, OpenWindows and X11R6 (2022)
summary:
This article details a retrocomputing enthusiast's experience running and comparing four GUI environments—MGR, SunView, OpenWindows, and X11R6—on a vintage Solbourne S3000 SPARC workstation running OS/MP (a variant of SunOS 4.x). The author, having upgraded the machine significantly, explores these GUIs as historical relics and competitors in the early workstation era.

The main focus is on MGR (ManaGeR), an early graphical terminal system developed at Bellcore, showcasing its unique approach of using escape sequences for communication, enabling applications to run even over Telnet. The article details the process of setting up and running MGR, including rebuilding the source code, installing terminal entries, and using utilities like hilbert, mgreyes, mphoon, browse, and mgrshowfont to demonstrate its capabilities, graphical features, and icon/font browsing.

The author highlights MGR's quirks, such as the limitation of applications only running within pre-existing windows and the inability to move windows offscreen. Despite these limitations, MGR's speed, low overhead, and compatibility with terminal-based programs are praised. The article also briefly mentions SunView, noting its age and inclusion in OS/MP, before diving into MGR. The piece sets the stage for future comparisons of SunView, OpenWindows and X11R6.

title: Occasionally USPS sends me pictures of other people's mail
summary:
The article "Occasionally USPS sends me pictures of other people's mail" details the author's experience with a privacy-compromising bug in the USPS's "Informed Delivery" service. Informed Delivery is a service where the USPS emails users a daily digest of scanned images of the mail they are scheduled to receive that day.

The author discovered that, on occasion, the emails contained scanned images of mail belonging to *other* people, not addressed to their household. This exposed the names, addresses, and potentially other sensitive information displayed on the outer envelopes of this misdirected mail.

The author emphasizes this is not a widespread issue affecting every Informed Delivery user daily, but rather an intermittent bug that appears sporadically. They have reported the issue to the USPS multiple times, including screenshots as evidence, but the problem persists. While acknowledging the benefits of Informed Delivery, the author expresses concern about the potential privacy implications of this bug, highlighting the risk of inadvertently revealing personal information to unintended recipients. The article also underscores the lack of a clear resolution or explanation from the USPS regarding the root cause or steps being taken to prevent future occurrences. The author ends by urging the USPS to address the issue seriously to protect the privacy of its customers.

title: Log by time, not by count
summary:
This article advocates for time-based logging over count-based logging when processing large volumes of events. The core argument is that logging every X seconds (time-based) is more consistent and beneficial than logging every X messages (count-based).

Count-based logging struggles to find a suitable value for "X" because event processing rates vary drastically between environments (e.g., production vs. testing). This can lead to either overwhelming log output at peak load, slowing down the system and increasing storage costs, or insufficient logs, hindering observability.

Time-based logging, in contrast, provides a consistent log rate regardless of the processing speed. By logging the number of events processed within a specific time interval, it ensures sufficient logging to confirm the application's activity without flooding the system with redundant information. This approach balances observability with performance, making it a more practical solution for applications dealing with fluctuating event processing rates. The author emphasizes that maintaining a consistent log rate is crucial for effective monitoring and troubleshooting.
chinese_title: 按时间记录，而非按数量。
chinese_summary:
在处理大量事件时，本文提倡基于时间而非基于计数的日志记录。核心论点是，每隔 X 秒记录一次日志（基于时间）比每处理 X 条消息记录一次日志（基于计数）更稳定且更有益。

基于计数的日志记录难以找到合适的“X”值，因为事件处理速率在不同环境（例如，生产环境与测试环境）之间差异很大。这可能导致高峰负载时日志输出过多，降低系统速度并增加存储成本，或者日志不足，阻碍可观察性。

相比之下，基于时间的日志记录提供一致的日志记录速率，而不管处理速度如何。通过记录特定时间间隔内处理的事件数量，它确保有足够的日志来确认应用程序的活动，而不会用冗余信息淹没系统。这种方法平衡了可观察性和性能，使其成为处理波动事件处理速率的应用程序的更实用解决方案。作者强调，保持一致的日志记录速率对于有效的监控和故障排除至关重要。

title: New colors without shooting lasers into your eyes
summary:
This article explores the possibility of experiencing new colors beyond the standard human color gamut without using invasive laser stimulation. The author begins by explaining how our eyes perceive color through overlapping cone cell sensitivities, limiting the range of colors we normally see. A research paper (Fong et al., 2025) selectively stimulated individual cone cells with lasers, reportedly leading to subjects seeing "blue-green of unprecedented saturation."

The author then introduces an optical illusion as a potential method to achieve a similar effect. By staring at a shrinking red circle on a bluish-green background, the red circle saturates red-sensitive cones, allowing for a greater activation of green-sensitive cones and a perceived intense blue-green color.

However, the author acknowledges that the range of colors that screens can display is limited by sRGB colorspace, which cannot reproduce all colors in the human gamut. As such, the illusions may not completely replicate the effects of direct cone stimulation. The author provides a tool for readers to experiment with different color combinations to explore the effects of this type of illusion. Finally, the author touches on the potential for these illusions to assist individuals with colorblindness and encourages readers to experiment and share their experiences.
chinese_title: 不伤眼的新色彩
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了在不使用侵入性激光刺激的情况下，体验超出标准人类色域之外的新颜色的可能性。作者首先解释了我们的眼睛如何通过重叠的锥状细胞敏感度来感知颜色，从而限制了我们通常看到的颜色范围。一篇研究论文（Fong et al., 2025）选择性地用激光刺激单个锥状细胞，据报道，这导致受试者看到了“前所未有的饱和度的蓝绿色”。

作者随后介绍了一种光学错觉，作为实现类似效果的潜在方法。通过盯着蓝绿色背景上一个不断缩小的红色圆圈，红色圆圈会使对红色敏感的锥状细胞饱和，从而允许对绿色敏感的锥状细胞进行更大的激活，并感知到强烈的蓝绿色。

然而，作者承认屏幕可以显示的颜色范围受到sRGB色彩空间的限制，该色彩空间无法重现人类色域中的所有颜色。因此，这些错觉可能无法完全复制直接锥状细胞刺激的效果。作者提供了一个工具，供读者尝试不同的颜色组合，以探索此类错觉的效果。最后，作者谈到了这些错觉帮助色盲人士的潜力，并鼓励读者进行实验并分享他们的经验。

title: The Sumerian Game: The ancestor of modern city builders
summary:
This article explores the historical significance of "The Sumerian Game," a 1964 strategy computer game considered a precursor to modern city-building and empire management games. Historian Andrea Contato explains that the game, initially designed for American schoolchildren, simulated the challenges of ruling the ancient Sumerian city of Lagash, requiring players to manage resources and make crucial decisions with significant consequences.

Despite its influence, "The Sumerian Game" was virtually unknown for decades until rediscovered through historical research. It is significant for several "firsts," including being one of the earliest computer games, an early example of edutainment, and possibly the first multimedia game, combining printed output with slides and audio. Mabel Addis, the history teacher who collaborated on the game, is often credited as the first writer and game designer.

While the original game and its source code are lost, Contato recreated several versions, available on Steam, to preserve its legacy. The article emphasizes the importance of recognizing the contributions of all individuals involved in its development, not just Mabel Addis. Contato hopes to commemorate the names of all those that developed "The Sumerian Game."
chinese_title: 苏美尔游戏：现代城市建造游戏的鼻祖
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了1964年的策略电脑游戏《苏美尔游戏》的历史意义。该游戏被认为是现代城市建设和帝国管理游戏的前身。历史学家安德烈亚·孔塔托解释说，这款最初为美国学童设计的游戏模拟了统治古代苏美尔城市拉格什的挑战，要求玩家管理资源并做出具有重大后果的关键决策。

尽管具有影响力，《苏美尔游戏》在几十年里几乎无人知晓，直到通过历史研究才被重新发现。它因几个“第一”而意义重大，包括成为最早的电脑游戏之一、早期教育娱乐的例子，以及可能是第一个多媒体游戏，结合了印刷输出、幻灯片和音频。参与游戏合作的历史老师梅布尔·艾迪斯通常被认为是第一位作家和游戏设计师。

虽然原始游戏及其源代码已丢失，但孔塔托在Steam上重建了几个版本，以保存其遗产。本文强调了认识到所有参与游戏开发的人员（而不仅仅是梅布尔·艾迪斯）的贡献的重要性。孔塔托希望纪念所有开发《苏美尔游戏》的人员的姓名。

title: Super-resolution microscopes reveal new details of cells and disease
summary:
This article, "Super-resolution microscopes reveal new details of cells and disease," explores how advanced light microscopy is revolutionizing our understanding of cell biology and disease. Super-resolution microscopes overcome the diffraction limit of traditional light microscopes, allowing scientists to visualize cellular structures and processes at a much finer scale (down to 10 nanometers). This is achieved through techniques like single-molecule localization microscopy, stimulated emission depletion, and structured illumination microscopy.

The enhanced resolution is enabling scientists to revise biology textbooks by revealing previously unseen cell structures. Examples include the membrane-associated periodic skeleton (MPS) in neurons, and the diverse protein compositions on the surfaces of lysosomes. Researchers are also studying the interactions between organelles, like mitochondria and the endoplasmic reticulum, and how disruptions in these interactions may contribute to diseases like ALS.

Furthermore, super-resolution microscopy provides new insights into the organization of DNA within the cell nucleus, revealing the variability of chromatin structures and their impact on gene expression. This has implications for understanding cell differentiation and stem cell biology.

The technology is also proving valuable in studying diseases like cancer and viral infections. It allows researchers to visualize proteins on cancer cell surfaces, enabling better targeting of therapies, and to observe the intricate processes by which viruses infect and replicate within cells, potentially leading to new antiviral strategies.  The ongoing refinements to super-resolution technology promise to further expand our understanding of the inner workings of cells.

title: XMLUI
summary:
This article introduces XMLUI, a framework designed to simplify web application development by bringing the ease of use reminiscent of Visual Basic to the modern web, particularly the React ecosystem. XMLUI allows developers to compose React components using XML markup, abstracting away the complexities of React and CSS.

The author highlights the power of XMLUI by demonstrating how a few lines of XML can create functional and reactive web applications, illustrated with an example of a London tube status checker app. He emphasizes the component-based nature of XMLUI, which enables developers to create and reuse components, including user-defined ones.

A key benefit is XMLUI's reactivity, where changes in one component automatically update others, similar to a spreadsheet. The article also touches on the theming system, which allows developers to customize the appearance of their applications without needing extensive CSS knowledge.

The author suggests that XMLUI offers a way to build modern web applications with less complexity and steeper learning curve, empowering a broader range of developers, even those less experienced with React and CSS.  He positions it as a viable alternative to the complexity often associated with JavaScript-based web development.

title: Man wearing metallic necklace dies after being sucked into MRI machine
summary:
A 61-year-old man died after being pulled into an MRI machine at Nassau Open MRI in New York. The man, Keith, entered the MRI room without permission while his wife was having a scan, and his heavy metallic necklace caused him to be violently drawn into the machine.

According to police, the incident "resulted in a medical episode," and Keith was pronounced dead at the scene. His wife, Adrienne Jones-McAllister, explained that she had asked him to enter the room to help her up after her knee scan. Keith was wearing a 20lb metal chain with a lock he used for weight training. She claims the machine immediately pulled him in, causing him to hit it.

Jones-McAllister stated that this was not their first visit to the facility and that an employee had previously seen the necklace. She also claimed the technician struggled to pull her husband away and that she pleaded for them to turn the machine off and call 911.

MRI machines use powerful magnetic fields and patients are always instructed to remove metallic objects before entering the room to prevent them from becoming dangerous projectiles. The US Food and Drug Administration warns that metallic objects can be attracted to the machine and cause injury or damage. A similar incident occurred in 2001 where a child died after an oxygen tank became a projectile due to the MRI's magnetic force.

title: Show HN: X11 desktop widget that shows location of your network peers on a map
summary:
Connmap is an X11 desktop widget (also works on Wayland) that displays the geographical location of your network peers on a world map. It's configurable, allowing you to set the initial position, map width (height is automatically calculated), outline color (black or white), and update interval.

To install, clone the GitHub repository, install the required build, installation, and runtime dependencies (xlib, libxext, libxfixes, libcairo2, unzip, and iproute2), run `make install`, and then execute the compiled binary. The widget's configuration is stored in `~/.config/connmap/connmaprc`.

The configuration file allows customization of the widget's initial `location_x` and `location_y` coordinates on the desktop, the map's `map_width` (height is derived from this), whether the map outline should be `black` or white, and the `update_interval` which specifies how often the application refreshes the network connection list.

It's been primarily tested with i3wm and may not function as expected in other desktop environments. Currently, only IPv4 connections are supported. You can add it to your i3wm config to run at startup.

title: The Gentoo Perl versioning scheme
summary:
This Gentoo Wiki article explains the challenges of Perl versioning and how Gentoo addresses them. Upstream Perl uses two version schemes, one of which (floating-point versions) is incompatible with Gentoo's integer-based version sorting. Floating-point versions treat `1.1` and `1.10` as equal, while v-versions (e.g., `v1.2`) are sorted as integer sequences. This leads to inconsistent sorting.

Gentoo's solution involves translating upstream Perl versions into a consistent scheme that preserves the original sorting order. This translation is implemented in `Gentoo::PerlMod::Version` and transforms "floating" versions into a "v-Version" format (without the "v"). This involves padding, splitting, and stripping zeros to create a minimum of three digit groups. For example, `1.1` becomes `1.100.0`, and `1.0001` becomes `1.0.100`.

The resulting Gentoo versions, when used with Perl's version comparison functions, behave the same as the original pre-normalized versions.  This avoids comparison inconsistencies and allows for predictable results. The article also mentions and criticizes competing normalization schemes that fail to retain comparison positions, highlighting the benefits of Gentoo's approach. The article emphasizes that by converting the floating-point version numbers to an integer sequence format, version comparisons will act predictably, and according to upstream's intention.

title: Agents built from alloys
summary:
Albert Ziegler from XBOW shares a novel AI agent strategy called "Alloyed Agents" that significantly improves vulnerability detection performance. The core idea is to combine different Large Language Models (LLMs) within a single agentic loop, leveraging their individual strengths. Instead of consistently using one LLM, the agent alternates between models (e.g., Gemini and Sonnet) during its iterative process, giving each model the opportunity to contribute to the solution based on its strengths.

This approach is particularly effective for tasks requiring multiple, distinct ideas to be combined, where each LLM might excel in different aspects. Ziegler observed that alloys perform best when the combined models are significantly different in their areas of expertise and when balanced toward the stronger individual model.

He contrasts alloyed agents with other approaches to combining model strengths: using different models for different tasks, having models vote on answers, or letting models debate with each other, arguing that these are too complex or computationally expensive for their use case.

Ziegler provides data showing that alloyed agents using combinations of models like Sonnet and Gemini outperform single-model agents. He also outlines scenarios where alloyed agents might not be suitable, such as when prompt caching is critical, the task requires steady progress rather than bursts of insight, or when models are too similar.

title: Simulating hand-drawn motion with SVG filters
summary:

The author breaks down the effect into two components: distorting edges to look less perfect and animating these distortions over time. They then detail how to achieve this using SVG filter primitives, specifically `feTurbulence` to generate noise and `feDisplacementMap` to use that noise to warp the image.

The article explains how `feTurbulence` creates a noise texture and `feDisplacementMap` uses it to offset the image pixels, resulting in a warping effect.  The core of the technique lies in animating the parameters of these filters using JavaScript. By updating attributes like `baseFrequency` at regular intervals, a dynamic distortion is created, simulating the boiling motion.

Interactive demos are provided to illustrate the interplay of the filters and the impact of various parameters, such as animation scale and base frequency offset. The article concludes that by combining procedural noise, displacement mapping, and JavaScript-driven animation, static illustrations can be brought to life with a convincing hand-drawn aesthetic. The author emphasizes that subtlety is key to achieving a convincing effect.

title: Debugging Bash Like a Sire (2023)
summary:
This article delves into effective Bash debugging techniques, emphasizing the limitations of built-in options like `set -euxo pipefail`. While these options offer some protection, they often lack specific error location and context. The author advocates for a custom logging approach to provide more informative debugging.

The core of the solution involves creating logging functions: `log::info` for general messages, `log::level_is_active` to control log verbosity based on a `LOG_LEVEL` variable, and `log::_write_log` for the actual writing. `log::_write_log` formats log messages with timestamps, filenames (extracted using parameter substitution on `BASH_SOURCE`), function names (`FUNCNAME`), and redirects output to stderr.

The author then introduces `log::error`, which extends the logging capabilities by including a stack trace. It iterates through `FUNCNAME` to capture the call stack, using `BASH_SOURCE` and `BASH_LINENO` to pinpoint the file and line number where the error occurred. The article showcases an example error log with a stack trace, demonstrating its utility in identifying the root cause of problems.

Finally, the author suggests using a `trap` to automatically log errors and stack traces when a script exits with a non-zero status, ensuring comprehensive error reporting. This approach provides detailed insights into Bash script execution, greatly simplifying the debugging process compared to relying solely on built-in error handling.

该解决方案的核心在于创建日志记录函数：`log::info`用于记录一般消息，`log::level_is_active`基于`LOG_LEVEL`变量控制日志详细程度，以及`log::_write_log`用于实际写入。 `log::_write_log`使用时间戳、文件名（使用参数替换从`BASH_SOURCE`中提取）、函数名 (`FUNCNAME`) 格式化日志消息，并将输出重定向到 stderr。

然后，作者介绍了`log::error`，它通过包含堆栈跟踪来扩展日志记录功能。它迭代`FUNCNAME`以捕获调用堆栈，使用`BASH_SOURCE`和`BASH_LINENO`来精确定位发生错误的文件和行号。本文展示了一个带有堆栈跟踪的示例错误日志，证明了它在识别问题根源方面的效用。

最后，作者建议使用`trap`在脚本以非零状态退出时自动记录错误和堆栈跟踪，从而确保全面的错误报告。与仅仅依赖内置错误处理相比，这种方法提供了对 Bash 脚本执行的详细洞察，大大简化了调试过程。

title: Stdio(3) change: FILE is now opaque

The `__sFILE` definition has been moved to a hidden header file, `libc/hidden/_stdio.h`.

The change affects many system components, including libcrypto, libtls, libssl, and the profiling subsystem. To accommodate this transition, the shared library versions of libc and other libraries that use `std{in,out,err}` have been bumped. The symbols `__sF`, `__srget`, and `__swbuf` are being kept temporarily but will be removed in the future.

The author emphasizes the scale of the change and advises developers building from source to use a snapshot upgrade to navigate the version bumps. The change was developed by guenther, tweaked and tested by others, and approved by sthen and tb.

title: A circle and a hyperbola living in one plot
summary:
This article explores the geometric representation of complex eigenvalues of real matrices using 3D plots. It demonstrates how the equation \(x^2 + (y + zi)^2 = 1\), where \(x\), \(y\), and \(z\) are real numbers, visually encompasses both a circle and a hyperbola. By expanding the equation and separating it into real and imaginary parts, the author derives two conditions: a hyperbola in the *xz*-plane (\(x^2 - z^2 = 1\) when \(y=0\)) and a circle in the *xy*-plane (\(x^2 + y^2 = 1\) when \(z=0\)).

The article then connects this visualization to the behavior of eigenvalues of real matrices dependent on a real parameter, \(\mu\). A specific example, \(M(\mu) = \begin{bmatrix} 0 & 1+\mu \\ 1-\mu & 0 \end{bmatrix}\), illustrates how the geometry of the plot reveals the nature of the eigenvalues (real or complex conjugate) based on the value of \(\mu\).

The author then offers another example, \(M(\mu) = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & \mu \\ 1 & 1 \end{bmatrix}\) leading to the equation \(((y+zi)-1)^2=x\). Splitting into real and imaginary components then yields a parabola in the \(xz\)-plane and a parabola in the \(xy\)-plane.

Finally, the article concludes by mentioning a Desmos calculator that can be used to create similar plots for other 2x2 matrices dependent on a single real parameter.

title: What my mother didn’t talk about (2020)
summary:
In "What My Mother Didn't Talk About," Karolina Waclawiak reflects on her mother's death and the complexities of their relationship, particularly her mother's aversion to acknowledging her illness. Waclawiak recounts searching her mother's emails, hoping to find evidence that she had been truthful about the severity of her condition. Her mother, diagnosed with stage 4 cancer 28 years prior, rarely spoke openly about her disease, viewing illness as a source of humiliation stemming from her childhood experiences in postwar Poland, where her father's tuberculosis led to social isolation.

The essay explores her mother's difficult upbringing, marked by poverty and the desire to escape the limitations of Communist Poland. Waclawiak shares anecdotes about her family's emigration to America, their eventual return to Poland and Austria, and the refugee camp they resided in. Her mother found success as a consulting engineer in the US, embodying the immigrant dream of reinvention.

Despite their close bond, Waclawiak grapples with the feeling that she didn't truly know her mother. Her mother's stoicism, born from a fear of vulnerability, prevented her from fully sharing her experiences and emotions. In her final days, her mother's personality changed after her heart stopped during surgery, becoming more aggressive and desperate. The essay culminates in Waclawiak's regret over her inability to confront the reality of her mother's impending death and her enduring sense of displacement and loss.

title: SIOF (Scheme in One File) – A Minimal R7RS Scheme System
summary:
SIOF (Scheme In One File) is a minimal, portable R7RS Scheme interpreter built from a single C source file. It prioritizes ease of compilation and deployment, requiring only a C compiler and standard C runtime libraries. Compilation instructions, including optimizations for performance and size, are provided.

SIOF adheres to Scheme principles, featuring a precise garbage collector, tail recursion, `call/cc`, dynamic-wind, multiple return values, and a hygienic macro system. While mostly R7RS-small compatible, it has limitations like fixed-precision numbers (30-bit fixnums, doubles for flonums), no bignum/rational/complex support, and limited Unicode support. Several R7RS-small features are simplified or not fully implemented.

The REPL supports circular structures (though `eval` and `load` reject them), provides all R7RS-small forms in the built-in library, and dynamically loads libraries from .sld files. The `-L` command-line option extends the library search path. The `features` procedure returns a list including `r7rs`, `exact-closed`, `siof`, and the SIOF version. Interaction environment exposes all R7RS-small procedures and syntax forms directly, removing the need for import in simple cases.

SIOF's origins are in the #F language, with its compiler derived from Marc Feeley's Scheme Interpreter and its macroexpander from Al Petrofsky's alexpander. S4IOF and S5IOF are related projects, offering smaller systems without macros and an R5RS-compatible variant, respectively.

summary:

The new thin-film Peltier technology, developed with Johns Hopkins APL, significantly improves cooling efficiency (75% higher than conventional devices) by minimizing heat loss. This was achieved through a novel packaging method and thermal interface materials that ensure efficient heat transfer.

The hybrid refrigerator utilizes the compressor for normal operations and the Peltier device for high-load situations, reducing power consumption by up to 30% compared to top-rated energy-efficient models in Korea. The company aims to expand the availability of hybrid models to hotter regions like India.

Samsung's long-term goal is to create fully refrigerant-free refrigerators powered solely by Peltier cooling, integrating AI, semiconductor processing, and 3D printing into their research. This approach addresses environmental concerns associated with refrigerants and offers a more versatile, energy-efficient cooling solution. The DA Business and Samsung Research are collaborating to perfect the technology and expedite its commercialization.

title: FFmpeg devs boast of another 100x leap thanks to handwritten assembly code
summary:
This Tom's Hardware article reports on a significant performance boost in FFmpeg, a cross-platform media transcoding application, achieved through handwritten assembly code. A recent patch claims a "100x speedup" for the 'rangedetect8_avx512' function. While the developers clarified that this dramatic improvement applies to a single, obscure filter and not the entirety of FFmpeg, users with modern processors supporting AVX512 should see the full benefit, while others will see a smaller uplift.

The article highlights the ongoing relevance of hand-optimized assembly code, contrasting it with compiler-generated code. This practice, prevalent in older computing eras with limited resources, continues to offer substantial performance gains in specific situations. The FFmpeg team even runs a "school" dedicated to assembly language.

However, the comments section reveals nuance to the story. Commenters point out that the original speed comparisons were made against unoptimized C code, and optimized C code with vector intrinsics can close the gap. The patch has not been merged at the time of writing due to a bug being found, and a revised patch offers 55x over generic C. The article concludes with criticism of the author for prematurely reporting the patch without reviewing the full discussion in the FFmpeg development mailing list.

title: A Tour of Microsoft's Mac Lab (2006)
summary:
In this 2006 blog post, David Weiss provides a virtual tour of Microsoft's Mac Lab, showcasing the infrastructure supporting the Macintosh Business Unit (MacBU). The lab, a 2000 sq ft space, houses a vast collection of Apple hardware used for testing and development of Mac software, including a "Sandbox" with various hardware configurations.

Weiss details the evolution of their Mac collection, lamenting the removal of older Macs due to space constraints. He emphasizes the crucial role of ADIC backup robots and Veritas Backup Exec in ensuring data integrity, recounting a recent data loss incident and the subsequent fix.

A key focus is the automated testing system. Utilizing hundreds of machines, starting with Blue and White G3s and evolving to Mac minis, the lab runs thousands of daily tests on multiple builds of Office. These Mac minis are managed with KVM switches and Apple Remote Desktop, enabling efficient remote access and control.

The automation system relies on an Xserve RAID and XSAN for data storage, holding OS images ranging from Mac OS 8.1 to 10.4.6 in multiple languages. The post also highlights other aspects of the lab, including hallways for easy access, the team's balanced work/play environment with a foosball table, a well-stocked Mac library, and a printer lab dedicated to ensuring excellent printing quality with various printer models. Finally, Weiss emphasizes the importance of fun and morale-boosting events within the MacBU team.

title: JOVE – Jonathan’s Own Version of Emacs
summary:

The document also describes how to configure temporary file directories (`JTMPDIR`) for crash recovery, suggesting adjustments based on system behavior. Finally, it mentions the availability of JOVE resources for XTerm and instructions for creating RPM packages on Red Hat-based Linux distributions. title: How to handle people dismissing io_uring as insecure? (2024)
summary:
This GitHub discussion thread addresses the perception of io_uring as an insecure technology and how to counter that perception. The original poster, cmazakas, is developing an io_uring runtime and faces resistance from developers who believe it's inherently insecure due to past CVEs.

Jens Axboe (axboe), the maintainer of liburing, clarifies that the negative perception largely stems from older kernel versions used by Android, which had design flaws in asynchronous offload. These flaws have since been addressed in kernel versions 5.10 and later by changing the thread model. He emphasizes that current io_uring implementations are carefully designed, with extensive testing, and are being used in production at Meta. Axboe points out that security issues are common in the kernel, and io_uring is no less secure than other components. He also notes that some issues tagged as io_uring-related were simply triggered by io_uring but weren't inherent flaws within it.

krisman highlights growing interest in io_uring within the enterprise world, suggesting that the negative perception from the Android/Google space isn't dominant. He also mentions a perceived decline in the complexity and number of reported CVEs against io_uring.

YoSTEALTH shares personal experiences of encountering baseless criticisms of io_uring and offers that can't be countered with actual facts.

In 2025, AugustH posts links to blog posts that highlight potential security concerns with io_uring. Axboe replies that these concerns aren't security issues, but highlight the deficiencies of legacy syscall monitoring or blocking solutions.

In essence, the consensus is that while early io_uring implementations had security issues, these have been addressed in newer kernels and the current io_uring is considered secure, actively developed, and used in production. The perception of insecurity is often based on outdated information.

liburing 的维护者 Jens Axboe (axboe) 澄清说，这种负面看法主要源于 Android 使用的较旧内核版本，这些版本在异步卸载方面存在设计缺陷。 这些缺陷已在 5.10 及更高版本的内核中通过更改线程模型得到解决。 他强调，目前的 io_uring 实现经过精心设计，进行了广泛的测试，并在 Meta 中投入生产使用。 Axboe 指出，安全问题在内核中很常见，io_uring 并不比其他组件更不安全。 他还指出，一些被标记为与 io_uring 相关的问题只是由 io_uring 触发，但并非其固有的缺陷。

title: Delta pilot performs 'aggressive maneuver' to avoid a B-52 bomber

title: Logical implication is a comparison operator
summary:
This article argues that logical implication (a ⇒ b) can be understood as a comparison operator, specifically a ≤ b, when represented using boolean logic where true is 1 and false is 0. The author observes the similarity in notation between "⇒" and ">=" and uses this as a starting point to explain the connection.

The core idea is that "x ⇒ y" asserts that if x is true (1), then y must also be true (1). The only scenario where the implication fails is when x is true (1) and y is false (0), mirroring the condition where x > y. Therefore, the author proposes that x ≤ y accurately represents the truth value of x ⇒ y.

The author then demonstrates the usefulness of this interpretation with three examples: transitivity of implication, denying the consequent, and denying the antecedent. By converting these logical statements into inequalities, the proofs become more straightforward and intuitive. For example, transitivity of implication becomes a ≤ b and b ≤ c implying a ≤ c. The article corrects an initial error in the "Denying the Consequent" example thanks to feedback. Overall, the article advocates for understanding logical implication as a comparison operator to simplify proofs and gain a deeper understanding of logical relationships.
chinese_title: 逻辑蕴涵是一种比较运算符
chinese_summary:
本文认为，当使用布尔逻辑（真为1，假为0）表示时，逻辑蕴涵 (a ⇒ b) 可以理解为一个比较运算符，具体来说是 a ≤ b。作者观察到“⇒”和“≥”在符号上的相似性，并以此为出发点来解释这种联系。

其核心思想是，“x ⇒ y”断言如果 x 为真 (1)，那么 y 也必须为真 (1)。蕴涵失效的唯一情况是当 x 为真 (1) 而 y 为假 (0) 时，这与 x > y 的情况相对应。因此，作者提出 x ≤ y 能够准确地表示 x ⇒ y 的真值。

然后，作者用三个例子（蕴涵的传递性、否定后件和否定前件）来证明这种解释的有用性。通过将这些逻辑语句转换为不等式，证明变得更加直接和直观。例如，蕴涵的传递性变为 a ≤ b 且 b ≤ c 意味着 a ≤ c。文章根据反馈修正了“否定后件”示例中的一个初始错误。总的来说，本文提倡将逻辑蕴涵理解为一种比较运算符，以简化证明并更深入地理解逻辑关系。
